topic.title: How to Factory Reset Gigaset Maxwell
topic.shortdesc: This guide takes Gigaset Maxwell 3 running firmware 2.22.7 as an example.

ol.li:
Find the phone IP address.
Press the Control key when the phone is idle, navigate to Settings Info on the phone.
Log in the phone web interface with your password: admin.
Go to System Reboot and Reset , click Reset to Factory Settings.

Click OK to reset the phone.
The phone will be reset successfully after startup.
Do not power off during phone startup.
